Package org.cibseven.bpm.container.impl.jmx

Class MBeanServiceContainer

java.lang.Object
org.cibseven.bpm.container.impl.jmx.MBeanServiceContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlatformServiceContainer
public class MBeanServiceContainer extends Object implements PlatformServiceContainer

A simple Service Container that delegates to the JVM's MBeanServer.

Author:
Daniel Meyer
